xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_time: The changes will be effective in 1-5 minutes.
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_description: The higher the SNR (signal-to-noise ratio) is, the more stable the line will be, but the lower the throughput will be.
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_24m: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 24000 / 1024 noise margin at 6dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_2m: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 2432 / 1024 noise margin higher than 6dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_512k: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 608 / 160 noise margin higher than 6dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_safe1: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 16128 / 1024 noise margin at 10dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_safe2: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 16128 / 1024 noise margin at 16dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_perf1: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 24000 / 1024 noise margin at 3dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_adsl_perf2: {{profile}}: Maximum throughput at 24000 / 1024 noise margin at 1dB
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_vdsl_2m: {{profile}}: SNR 6 with a throughput limit at 2M
xdsl_access_profile_tooltip_vdsl_512k: {{profile}}: SNR 6 with a throughput limit of 512K
